name: Zero spring episode 1 Japanese version
detailed_description:
Because we released games of similar content in two languages
,according to the recommendation from STEAM, Japanese version
has retired from steam store search.
Support for this game is ended.
We will make an effort so that there will not be such a thing from the next work.
We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
Those who purchased can continue to access the game.

Thank you.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/951010/Zero_spring_episode_1_English_translation_version/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/974010/Zero_spring_episode_2/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1000900/Zero_spring_episode_3/

short_description: Support for this game is ended.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2700 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 or later - (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2700 MB available space
